Title: Enacts the "department of financial services open data act"
Summary: Requires the department of financial services to comply with the provisions of Executive Order 95 of 2013, "Using Technology to Promote Transparency, Improve Government Performance and Enhance Citizen Engagement", and to provide the New York state office of information technology services and the legislature certain necessary data.
LawCode: Add ยง208, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to enacting the "department of financial services open data act"
